attributes.action: legislate  for an independent judicial commission with powers to investigate and try officers of the Supreme Court, court and legal services and their staff for allege abuses of powers alleged in writing by any citizen of the United Kingdom and supported by evidence, and to include:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your name has been identified in the petition.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
